Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Ebon Hawk VF
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description:
The Ebon Hawk, a legendary vessel, renowned for its versatility and resilience, epitomizes the epitome of starship engineering. Originally a freighter, it has been extensively modified for various roles, from smuggling to combat, earning its reputation as a vessel capable of navigating the most treacherous of spaceways. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x2, Passenger x6
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Aurek
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Aurek, a staple starfighter of the Galactic Republic, is renowned for its speed, maneuverability, and combat prowess. Designed for reconnaissance and dogfighting, it boasts advanced weaponry and shielding, making it a formidable adversary in space battles. \n\n<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x1

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Basilisk
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Basilisk, a formidable assault airspeeder utilized by the Mandalorian warriors, is known for its rugged design and heavy firepower. Equipped with advanced weaponry and reinforced armor plating, it serves as a versatile ground attack vehicle capable of engaging enemy forces with devastating effect.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x1

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Defender
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Defender, a versatile starfighter utilized by the Galactic Republic, combines speed, maneuverability, and firepower. With its advanced shielding and weaponry, it's well-suited for a variety of combat missions, from dogfighting in space to ground support operations.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x1, Astromech Droid x1

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Fury VF
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description:
The Fury, a high-speed starfighter utilized by the Galactic Republic, is designed for rapid deployment and reconnaissance missions. With its advanced technology and sleek design, it's capable of outmaneuvering most adversaries in both space and atmospheric combat.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Reactor Core

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: HammerHead VF
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description:
The HammerHead, a versatile starship utilized by the Galactic Republic, is known for its durability and firepower. It serves various roles, from escort missions to heavy assault, making it a formidable presence in any engagement.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Reactor Core

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Mantis VF
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description:
The Mantis, a nimble starship utilized by the Galactic Republic, is renowned for its agility and precision. It excels in reconnaissance missions and hit-and-run tactics, capable of swiftly evading enemy fire while delivering precise strikes.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Reactor Core

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Phantom VF
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description:
The Phantom, a stealthy starship utilized by the Galactic Republic, is adept at infiltration and covert operations. Equipped with advanced cloaking technology, it can slip past enemy defenses undetected, making it invaluable for espionage and surprise attacks.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Reactor Core

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Sith Interceptor VF
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description:
The Sith Interceptor, a swift starship employed by the Sith Empire, is designed for quick strikes and agile combat maneuvers. With its advanced weaponry and high speed, it excels in intercepting and neutralizing enemy threats.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Reactor Core

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Supremacy VF
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description:
The Supremacy, a massive starship of the Old Republic, is a symbol of power and dominance. With its formidable armaments and imposing presence, it strikes fear into the hearts of its enemies and asserts the authority of its faction across the galaxy.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Reactor Core

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: ThunderClap
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description:
The ThunderClap, a massive starship of the Old Republic, is a symbol of power and dominance. With its formidable armaments and imposing presence, it strikes fear into the hearts of its enemies and asserts the authority of its faction across the galaxy.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Reactor Core
